verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the Word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
The same <S%G3778><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

All things <S%G3956><s%> were made <S%G1096><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Without <S%G5565><s%> him <S%G846><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> anything <S%G1520><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> has been made. <S%G1096><s%>
In <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the life <S%G2222><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> shines <S%G5316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the darkness, <S%G4653><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the darkness <S%G4653><s%> hasn't <S%G3756><s%> overcome <S%G2638><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>
There came <S%G1096><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> whose <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was John. <S%G2491><s%>

The same <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> as <S%G1519><s%> a witness, <S%G3141><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might testify <S%G3140><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the light, <S%G5457><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> might believe <S%G4100><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
He was <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G1565><s%> light, <S%G5457><s%> but <S%G235><s%> was sent that <S%G1565><s%> he might testify <S%G3140><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the light. <S%G5457><s%>

The true <S%G228><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> enlightens <S%G5461><s%> <S%G3956><s%> everyone <S%G444><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>

He was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> recognize <S%G1097><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
He came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his own, <S%G2398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who were his own <S%G2398><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> receive <S%G3880><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G3745><s%> many as <S%G3745><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> he <S%G1325><s%> gave the right <S%G1849><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s children, <S%G5043><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who believe <S%G4100><s%> in his <S%G846><s%> name: <S%G3686><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> were born <S%G1080><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of man, <S%G435><s%> but <S%G235><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> became flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lived <S%G4637><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> us. <S%G2254><s%> We <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G2300><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> such glory <S%G1391><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the one and only Son <S%G3439><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the Father, <S%G3439><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of grace <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> testified <S%G3140><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out, <S%G3004><s%> saying, "This <S%G3778><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> he of whom <S%G3739><s%> I said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> 'He who comes <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> has <S%G1715><s%> surpassed <S%G1096><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> me. <S%G3450><s%>'"

For <S%G3754><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Moses. <S%G3475><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> were realized <S%G1096><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

No one <S%G3762><s%> has seen <S%G3708><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> at any time. <S%G4455><s%> The one <S%G3439><s%> and only Son, <S%G5207><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the bosom <S%G2859><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> has declared him. <S%G1834><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>'s testimony, <S%G3141><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Levites <S%G3019><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> ask <S%G2065><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you? <S%G4771><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> declared, <S%G3670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> deny, <S%G720><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> he declared, <S%G3670><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the Christ. <S%G3754><s%>"

They <S%G2036><s%> said therefore <S%G3767><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> are you? <S%G1488><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> us an answer <S%G612><s%> to take back <S%G1325><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who sent <S%G3992><s%> us. <S%G2248><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G3004><s%> say about <S%G4012><s%> yourself? <S%G4572><s%>"

He said, <S%G5346><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> am the voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> <S%G2116><s%> 'Make straight the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%>' as <S%G2531><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> said. <S%G2036><s%>"
The <S%G2532><s%> ones <S%G3588><s%> who had been sent <S%G649><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the Pharisees. <S%G5330><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> do you <S%G907><s%> baptize, <S%G1487><s%> if you <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> Elijah, <S%G2243><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> the prophet? <S%G4396><s%>"

<S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3004><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> baptize <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1473><s%> water, <S%G5204><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> stands <S%G2476><s%> one whom <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> don't <S%G2476><s%> know. <S%G1492><s%>

He <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the one who <S%G3739><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is preferred <S%G1096><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> sandal <S%G5266><s%> strap <S%G2438><s%> I <S%G1473><s%>'m not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to loosen. <S%G3089><s%>"

These things <S%G5023><s%> were done <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Bethany <S%G962><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> baptizing. <S%G907><s%>

The next day, <S%G1887><s%> he <S%G2491><s%> saw <S%G991><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G1492><s%> the Lamb <S%G286><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> takes away <S%G142><s%> the sin <S%G266><s%> of the world! <S%G2889><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he of <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3694><s%> 'After me <S%G3450><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is preferred <S%G1096><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> before <S%G4413><s%> me. <S%G3450><s%>'

I <S%G2504><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> for <S%G2443><s%> this reason <S%G1223><s%> <S%G99999><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> water: <S%G5124><s%> that he would be revealed <S%G5319><s%> to Israel. <S%G2474><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> testified, <S%G3140><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I have seen <S%G2300><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it remained <S%G3306><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him. <S%G3754><s%>

I <S%G2504><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> recognize <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> who sent <S%G3992><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to baptize <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> water, <S%G5204><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> <S%G1909><s%> 'On whomever <S%G3739><s%> you will see <S%G1492><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descending, <S%G2597><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> remaining <S%G3306><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> who baptizes <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G302><s%>'
I <S%G2504><s%> have seen, <S%G3708><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have testified <S%G3140><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"

Again, <S%G3825><s%> the next day, <S%G1887><s%> <S%G2476><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%>
and <S%G2532><s%> he looked <S%G1689><s%> at Jesus <S%G2424><s%> as he walked, <S%G4043><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G1492><s%> the Lamb <S%G286><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"
The <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%> speak, <S%G2980><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they followed <S%G190><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> turned, <S%G4762><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G2300><s%> them <S%G846><s%> following, <S%G190><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> are you looking <S%G2212><s%> for? <S%G1161><s%>" They said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Rabbi <S%G4461><s%>" (which <S%G3739><s%> is to say, <S%G3004><s%> being interpreted, <S%G2059><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%>), "where <S%G4226><s%> are you staying? <S%G3306><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Come, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see. <S%G1492><s%>" They came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G4225><s%> he was staying, <S%G3306><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they stayed <S%G3306><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%> It <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> the tenth <S%G1182><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>'s brother. <S%G3844><s%>

He <S%G3778><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "We have found <S%G2147><s%> the Messiah! <S%G3323><s%>" (which <S%G3739><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> being interpreted, <S%G3177><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>).

He <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1689><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> looked <S%G1689><s%> at him, <S%G846><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> "You <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Jonah. <S%G2495><s%> You <S%G4771><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> Cephas <S%G2786><s%>" (which <S%G3739><s%> is by interpretation, <S%G2059><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>).

On the next day, <S%G1887><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> was determined <S%G2309><s%> to go out <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> Philip. <S%G5376><s%> Jesus <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Follow <S%G190><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>"
Now <S%G1161><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Bethsaida, <S%G966><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> of Andrew <S%G406><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Peter. <S%G1537><s%>

Philip <S%G5376><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> Nathanael, <S%G3482><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "We have found <S%G2147><s%> him, <S%G3739><s%> of whom Moses <S%G3475><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> wrote: <S%G1125><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph. <S%G2501><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Can <S%G1410><s%> any <S%G5101><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing <S%G5101><s%> come <S%G1511><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> Nazareth? <S%G3478><s%>" Philip <S%G5376><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see. <S%G1492><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Behold, <S%G1492><s%> an Israelite <S%G2475><s%> indeed, <S%G230><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> deceit! <S%G1388><s%>"

Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "How <S%G4159><s%> do you <S%G1097><s%> know me? <S%G3165><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G2532><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> when you were <S%G5607><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the fig tree, <S%G4808><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> you. <S%G4571><s%>"
